item.title: Restriction of European Visitors in US media - an update
item.description: In November 2021, I did some testing to see how many US media were blocking European visitors to avoid complying with GDPR. To my surprise, most of them actually used the HTTP 451 code that was created in reference of Ray Bradbury’s Fahrenheit 451 novel. Example of page blocked with HTTP 451 (Source: Wikipedia) I recently found a new list of over 5000 US media domains established in 2021 by Clemm von Hohenberg, B.
